definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: row, line;—only of the rows of ‘shew’-bread; abs. ´[[מ]] Le 24:7, [[מַעֲרָָכֶת]] v:Le 24:6 (P); elsewh. Chr: ´[[לֶחֶם הַמּ]] 1Ch 9:32, 1Ch 23:29, Ne 10:34, ´[[שֻׁלְחַן הַמּ]] 2Ch 29:18, cf. 1Ch 28:16; cstr. [[מַעֲרֶכֶת לֶחֶם]] 2Ch 13:11 the row of bread, so ´[[מ]] 2Ch 2:3 the row of continuity, bread continually present in rows; pl. abs. [[שׁתַּיִם מַעֲרָכוֹת]] Le 24:6.
